When you feel like giving up, remember why you held on for so long in the first place.
You can win a lot in life just by being the last one to give up.
Never let anyone else tell you what is possible.
If you get tired, learn to rest, not to quit.
Things that last are built slowly.
Better to be slow and solid than fast and frail. Maxime Lagacé
The perfection of virtue is born in struggle.
No one does anything worthwhile without being criticized.
If you are immune to boredom, there is literally nothing you cannot accomplish.
If you do enough small things right, big things can happen.
The moment you give up, is the moment you let someone else win.
Bear without murmuring what cannot be changed.
Believe in the holy contour of life.
There is no easy way from the earth to the stars.
Fire is the test of gold; adversity, of strong men.
Arise, awake, and stop not till the goal is reached.
Showing up is the first step.
Will you rise up, or give up? Will you grow, or let it go?
We don’t quit, we don’t cower, we don’t run.
We endure and conquer. Kobe Bryant
Go forth on your path, as it exists only through your walking.
If you find a path with no obstacles, it probably doesn’t lead anywhere.
There’s no starting over, only getting up to begin again.
It comes from giving up. Mel Robbins
Miracles dwell in the invisible. Rumi
Courage faces fear and thereby masters it.
It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
I had a lot of clouds, but I have had so many rainbows in my clouds.
Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
You can overcome anything, if and only if you love something enough.
I can’t relate to lazy people. We don’t speak the same language.
No, I don’t ever give up. I’d have to be dead or completely incapacitated.
For water continually dropping will wear hard rocks hollow.
He who has a why to live for can bear almost any how.
If you can outlast, you win.
An ugly win is still a win.
You either give up and quit, or you get angry and fight.
Don’t stop until you are proud.
To fail is something, to quit is another.
Rest at the end, not at the middle.
Give up giving up, it’s the best thing you will ever quit.
Character is built when no one is looking.
In adversity, remember to keep an even mind.
Never, ever ever ever ever give up.
The harsher the failure, the better the lesson.
There’s a future me who is glad I never gave up.
No matter how small the step, forward is forward.
The pain of today is the foundation for the peace of tomorrow.
Focus on your current trajectory, not your current results.
You have three choices in life: give up, give in or give it all you got.
Hope is the language of people who refuse to give up on life.
Failure is research if you try again.
Every winner was a loser at some point. Don’t give up.
To keep on going, you have to keep up the rhythm.
The average man seek rewards in the short term. The wise don’t seek rewards at all.
You either win, or you give up before you win.
There are no other outcomes. Alex Hormozi
On a long enough timeline, you can beat anyone at anything.
It may be tempting to give up. But it’s in your power to begin again.
The noblest pleasure is the joy of understanding.
The key to learning is an awareness of where you lack understanding.
If you can’t explain it simply, you don’t understand it well enough.
If one does not understand a person, one tends to regard him as a fool.
Accepting is no substitute for understanding.
Be understanding, but don’t be blind.
Feeling is reactive, understanding is proactive.
The price of understanding is letting go what you know.
Understanding someone is another way of loving them.
To understand is to know what to do.
It is a fault to wish to be understood before we have made ourselves clear to ourselves.
Happiness doesn’t require practice, only understanding.
When you understand something, then it naturally calms you down.
O bliss of understanding, greater than the bliss of imagining or feeling.
The better you understand something, the more simply you can express it.
Those who don’t understand your silence, will never understand your words.
If we don’t understand people, we don’t understand business.
Understanding means throwing away your knowledge.
You can’t learn something if you’re scared of it.
True understanding is through love. Maxime Lagacé
I am so clever that sometimes I don’t understand a single word of what I am saying.
Attain self-understanding with silence. Maxime Lagacé
Many seek to refute before they seek to understand.
For broad understanding and deep feeling, you need pain and suffering.
Everything that irritates us about others can lead to an understanding of ourselves.
Don’t confuse listening with learning. Don’t confuse knowing with understanding.
The man of understanding finds everything laughable.
To understand everything is to forgive everything.
Fools judge because it’s easy. The wise try to understand, even if it’s hard.
You can only understand people if you feel them in yourself.
Much learning does not teach understanding.
We care more about knowing the next thing than understanding the last thing.
The point is to understand. Albert Einstein
Understanding is hard because it requires openness, slowness, and love.
Calmness follows order which follows understanding.
When you memorize, it’s a sign that you don’t understand.
The superior man understands what is right; the inferior man understands what will sell.
Enlightenment, to me, is a deep understanding of our true situation.
With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
The more you care, the stronger you can be.
Silence is a source of great strength.
Strength is a matter of a made up mind.
Scar tissue is stronger than regular tissue. Realize the strength, move on.
Normalize being a little crazy for what you believe in.
No one saves us but ourselves.
No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path. Buddha
The nearer a man comes to a calm mind, the closer he is to strength.
Mastering others is strength, mastering yourself is true power.
Do not pray for an easy life.
Pray for the strength to endure a difficult one. Bruce Lee
There’s nothing that cleanses your soul like getting the hell kicked out of you.
Faith is a vehicle for strength.
It is not the mountain we conquer but ourselves.
To have become a deeper man is the privilege of those who have suffered.
Yielding will overcome anything superior to itself; its strength is boundless.
That which does not kill us makes us stronger.
Strength does not come from physical capacity.
It comes from an indomitable will. Mahatma Gandhi
You never know how strong you are, until being strong is your only choice.
People do not lack strength, they lack will.
If you have no struggles, you’ll have no strength.
Pain was my motivation. Michael Jordan
Mental strength is not a gift.
Strong men believe in cause and effect. Ralph Waldo Emerson
Staying down is a choice. Unknown
Fall seven times, stand up eight.
The trials you encounter will introduce you to your strengths.
Adversity is the first path to truth.
Heroism is endurance for one moment more.
Some of us think holding on makes us strong; but sometimes it is letting go.
The bamboo that bends is stronger than the oak that resists.
I’ve never met a strong person with an easy past.
Be patient and tough; someday this pain will be useful to you.
The task ahead of you is never greater than the strength within you.
Perhaps I am stronger than I think.
Problems are the price you pay for progress.
Freedom comes from strength and self-reliance.
I survived because the fire inside me burned brighter than the fire around me.
Character is determined by choice, not opinion.
It’s not the strength of the body that counts, but the strength of the spirit.
The man who has done his best has done everything.
Strong men persevere. The wise keep going forever. Maxime Lagacé
Wisdom is organized life. Immanuel Kant
Doubt is the origin of wisdom.
The truest wisdom is a resolute determination.
Wisdom is not a product of schooling but of the lifelong attempt to acquire it.
Wisdom is the power to put our time and our knowledge to the proper use.
It is not the man who has too little, but the man who craves more, that is poor.
A wise man never loses anything, if he has himself.
A fool is known by his speech; and a wise man by silence.
Foolishness is a twin sister of wisdom.
There is only a finger’s difference between a wise man and a fool.
Never say no twice if you mean it.
Everything comes in time to him who knows how to wait.
Logic is the beginning of wisdom, not the end.
Silence is the sleep that nourishes wisdom.
A weak reaction is to rush things.
A strong reaction is to go slow and steady. Maxime Lagacé
The best words are the ones you are ready for.
Discipline is wisdom and vice versa.
The greatest wealth is to live content with little.
Wisdom is knowing when you can’t be wise.
Wisdom consists of the anticipation of consequences.
Wisdom and deep intelligence require an honest appreciation of mystery.
Wisdom is keeping a sense of fallibility of all our views and opinions.
Much wisdom often goes with fewest words.
Great wisdom is generous; petty wisdom is contentious.
The wise man who can command himself. Horace
We don’t stop playing because we grow old, we grow old because we stop playing.
True wisdom is remembering that in the end, no matter what, everything will be fine.
Silence at the proper season is wisdom, and better than any speech.
The most certain sign of wisdom is cheerfulness.
If the fool would persist in his folly he would become wise.
Don’t try to become, let go of who you’re not.
One principle eliminates a thousand decisions.
He that composes himself is wiser than he that composes a book.
Never does nature say one thing and wisdom another.
Pain is the doorway to wisdom and to truth.
Maturity is when you stop being surprised by anything.
Wisdom is when you start again. Maxime Lagacé
I prefer the folly of enthusiasm to the indifference of wisdom.
The wise are those who know the Self.
No man was ever wise by chance.
One part of wisdom is knowing what you don’t need anymore and letting it go.
Experience is often a result of lack of wisdom. Terry Pratchett
Has fortune dealt you some bad cards.
Then let wisdom make you a good gamester. Francis Quarles
The function of wisdom is to discriminate between good and evil.
Do now what your future you will thank you for.
Genius unrefined resembles a flash of lightning, but wisdom is like the sun.
Wisdom is seeing wounds and obstacles as blessings.
Innocence dwells with wisdom, but never with ignorance.
A little nonsense now and then, is cherished by the wisest men.
Wisdom is remembering life is short.
Respect yourself and others will respect you.
Superior people are caring. Maxime Lagacé
Respect is one of the greatest expressions of love.
Respect is how to treat everyone.
Respect for ourselves guides our morals; respect for others guides our manners.
Respect a man, he will do the more.
They cannot take away our self-respect if we do not give it to them.
If we lose love and self-respect for each other, this is how we finally die.
There is no respect for others without humility in one’s self.
This is how you start to get respect, by offering something that you have.
Give to every other human being every right that you claim for yourself.
Respecting someone indicate the quality of your personality.
Respect is for those who deserve not for those who demand it.
Respect for the truth comes close to being the basis for all morality.
I must respect the opinions of others even if I disagree with them.
A man who pays respect to the great paves the way for his own greatness.
Show respect to all people, but grovel to none.
The right to be respected is won by respecting others.
The secret of a happy life is respect.
Respect for yourself and respect for others. Ayad Akhtar
When I look at a person, I see a person – not a rank, not a class, not a title.
Respect is more than just caring for another, it’s caring for humanity.
A person’s a person, no matter how small.
The more things a man is ashamed of, the more respectable he is.
To the living we owe respect, but to the dead we owe only the truth.
Men have to do some awfully mean things to keep up their respectability.
Without feelings of respect, what is there to distinguish men from beasts?
We must learn to live together as brothers or perish together as fools.
Nothing is more despicable than respect based on fear.
Everyone should be respected as an individual, but no one idolized.
We do not covet anything from any nation except their respect.
Don’t work for anyone you do not respect and admire.
Only those who respect the personality of others can be of real use to them.
Make improvements, not excuses. Seek respect, not attention.
A man earns it. Maxime Lagacé
Men are respectable only as they respect.
Treat everyone with respect and kindness.
Respect is what we owe; love, what we give.
He who wants a rose must respect her thorn.
A lack of boundaries invites a lack of respect.
Self-respect is the real meal. Maxime Lagacé
Every act of self control leads to a sense of self-respect.
Do we not realize that self respect comes with self reliance?
Respect every opponent, but fear none.
If we can’t laugh at ourselves, do we have the right to laugh at others?
As we grow as unique persons, we learn to respect the uniqueness of others.
Tolerance only for those who agree with you is no tolerance at all.
I respect the man who knows distinctly what he wishes.
Being brilliant is no great feat if you respect nothing.
Respect yourself, respect your own inner voice and follow it.
If you want to earn respect, just take on responsibility.
You can’t respect yourself if you’re afraid to be who you are.
This is not your responsibility but it is your problem.
Take your life in your own hands, and what happens? A terrible thing: no one to blame.
I will keep constant watch over myself and‚ most usefully‚ will put each day up for review.
It is not enough that we do our best; sometimes we must do what is required.
Quit thy childhood, my friend, and wake up!
Right conduct controls the greater one. Mark Twain
I can pardon everyone’s mistakes but my own.
So many things are unimportant. You’re wise when you focus on the few that truly are.
You have to do your own growing no matter how tall your grandfather was.
You have a responsibility to contribute to the culture and times you live in.
To live a life of honesty and integrity is a responsibility of every decent person.
Responsibility is the price of freedom.
Life gets easier when you don’t blame other people and focus on what you can control.
We have to do the best we are capable of.
This is our sacred human responsibility. Albert Einstein
Make the best use of what is in your power, and take the rest as it happens.
Man is nothing else but what he makes of himself.
If something is broken it’s your responsibility to fix it.
That is why most men dread it. George Bernard Shaw
You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today.
It is wrong and immoral to seek to escape the consequences of one’s acts.
How few there are who have courage enough to own their faults.
It is the responsibility of intellectuals to speak the truth and expose lies.
The price of greatness is responsibility.
One has a moral responsibility to disobey unjust laws.
Taking responsibility is not an admission of guilt.
The price of greatness is responsibility.
No snowflake in an avalanche ever feels responsible.
What is an anarchist? One who, choosing, accepts the responsibility of choice.
No price is too high to pay for the privilege of owning yourself.
No way around it: It’s on you.
Only you can control your future.
The time is always right to do right.
It’s not your fault, but it’s your responsibility to do something about it.
Problems get bigger when you ignore them.
Is this fair? Is this the right thing to do?
I am responsible for everything in my life.
No one is coming to save you. Noah Kagan
Taking responsibility is taking your power back.
I am responsible for what I see.
When you’re in victim mode you are stuck in suffering.
Responsibility… that’s where the meaning in life is.
Freedom and responsibility aren’t given, they’re taken.
The right thing to do and the hard thing to do are usually the same.
Take responsibility for everything that happens to you.
Accept the terrible responsibility of life with eyes wide open.
We have the responsibility to put our gifts to work.
Notice that opportunity lurks where responsibility has been abdicated.
The smarter you get the more you respect who you truly are.
Taking responsibility instead of blaming others is a sign of wisdom.
Notice that opportunity lurks where responsibility has been abdicated.
Responsibility begins with courage and ends with honor.
Glory is apt to follow when industry has prepared the road.
Action springs not from thought, but from a readiness for responsibility.
Responsibility is done by you. It’s voluntary.
You can take as much of it as you want. Ben Sasse
If you have truly attained wholeness, everything will flock to you.
The day is always his, who works in it with serenity and great aims.
The key to serenity is trusting that the universe has your back.
From serenity comes gentleness, comes lasting strength.
Serenity is not freedom from the storm, but peace amid the storm.
The need for happiness will imprison you far more than happiness will liberate you.
Great tranquility of heart is his who cares for neither praise nor blame.
Boredom is the feeling that everything is a waste of time; serenity, that nothing is.
Rule your mind with serenity rather than with force and manipulation.
Care about doing your best. Don’t care about the results.
Change what cannot be accepted and accept what cannot be changed.
You shall begin it well and serenely. Ralph Waldo Emerson
It is inner stillness that will save and transform the world.
There is a place in you that you must keep inviolate, a place that you must keep clean.
Free from all thoughts of ‘I’ and ‘mine’, a man finds absolute peace.
Do your work, then step back.
The only path to serenity. Lao Tzu
Aimlessness, nonattainment, is a wonderful practice.
He that owns himself has lost nothing. But how few men are blessed with ownership of self!
Do your best and then relax.
If you lose your temper, you lose.
Allow nature to teach you stillness.
Movement is good for the body.
Stillness is good for the mind. Sakyong Mipham
Serenity is caring less about chaos.
Peace is a sense that everything is fine.
Everything I desire is within me.
A mind at war with itself cannot know peace.
Don’t be afraid to just sit and watch.
The quiet mind enters into the immeasurable.
Be yourself and you will feel at home anywhere.
Serenity comes when you trade expectations for acceptance.
The wiser you get, the more you enjoy the process.
When you let go of fear of the future, your soul feels light.
Outrage is a result of the belief that things should be a certain way.
Non-resistance is the key to the greatest power in the universe.
Whenever possible: Breathe and be kind. When that’s not possible: Breathe and be quiet.
Attachment, need, and desire all must go if one wishes to remain at peace.
The more present I am, the happier and more content I will be.
Quiet is another way of finding clarity.
When you let go of anger or resentment from the past, your heart feels light.
To be in harmony with the wholeness of things is not to have anxiety over imperfections.
When you lose touch with inner stillness, you lose touch with yourself.
The ability to be content and at peace, by yourself, is freedom.
The highest form of grace is silence.
It is also the highest spiritual instruction. Ramana Maharishi
The one who is free of every and any intention, even the intention to be free, is free indeed.
Serenity: When you stop expecting and start accepting.
